import React, { useState } from "react"; import FormatDate from "./FormatDate"; import WeatherIcon from "./WeatherIcon"; import WeatherTemperature from "./WeatherTemperature"; export default function WeatherDetails(props) { return (

{props.data.city}

  • {props.data.description}
  • Humidity: {props.data.humidity}%
  • Wind: {Math.round(props.data.wind)}mph
); }
